bug.short_desc: Error on moving window widget when browser zoomed

long_desc.thetext:
If you zoom the browser and move a widget the layout renderer throws an assertion error:
131350 Assertion error! : Expected value to be an integer but found 142.28573608398438! Stack trace: qx.core.AssertionError.constructor:44:38,qx.Class.constructor:1643:37,qx.core.Assert.__fail:75:19,qx.core.Assert.assertInteger:604:84,qx.type.BaseString.assertInteger:359:22,qx.ui.layout.Canvas.verifyLayoutProperty:129:18,qx.ui.core.LayoutItem.updateLayoutProperties:866:24,qx.ui.core.LayoutItem.setLayoutProperties:807:16,qx.ui.window.Window._onMoveMouseUp:301:12,qx.ui.core.EventHandler.prototype._dispatchEvent(),qx.event.dispatch.AbstractBubbling.prototype.dispatchEvent(),qx.core.Object.prototype.base(),qx.event.dispatch.MouseCapture.prototype.dispatchEvent(),qx.event.Manager.prototype.dispatchEvent(),qx.event.Registration.fireEvent(),qx.event.handler.Mouse.prototype.__fireEvent(),anonymous(),qx.event.handler.Mouse.prototype._onButtonEvent(),anonymous()
Looks like qx.ui.layout.Canvas.verifyLayoutProperty is checking for integer values, but browser returns number.
Browser zoom isn't supported anyway. But having an exception is still bad and could be fixed.
